Articles.Content: I'm looking to start a new career save and I want to have a different tech tree for once. I've always played with the stock tree until now. Any suggestions?

Or if you want something actually different than stock, try [Great-Big-Sky-Tech-Tree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126487-1-0-4-YongeTech-Great-Big-Sky-Tech-Tree-%28v1-1%29), or the [Engineering-Tech-Tree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125055-1-0-X-ETT-1-0-Engineering-Tech-Tree-%28with-flight-first-option%29).

> 
> [Community Tech Tree](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100385)

^ this. It is widely compatible with other mods.
